attacks.name: Major Flood
attacks.effect: Discard a Water Energy card attached to Kyogre ex. Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Major Earthquake
attacks.effect: Discard a Fighting Energy card attached to Groudon ex. Does 10 damage to your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Breath
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Torchic.

attacks.name: Fireworks
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Torchic.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Pikachu during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Plunder
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokémon (before they affect the damage).

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Freeze Dry
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sporadic Sponging
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 1 damage counter from Treecko.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Torchic.

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.effect: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Ludicolo.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: The Third Eye
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Jirachi and draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Magnetic Call
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Metal Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beldum is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Metal Charge
attacks.effect: Put 1 damage counter on Beldum.

attacks.name: Metal Load
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Metang.

attacks.name: Resonate
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches each Defending Pokémon with his or her Benched Pokémon. If your opponent has only 1 Benched Pokémon, you choose the Defending Pokémon to switch.

attacks.name: Healing Sound
attacks.effect: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Active Pokémon. Each Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Sand Pit
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Dragonbreath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Leaf Slice
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Pure Body
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Suicune, discard an Energy card attached to Suicune. (You can't attach a Water Energy card from your hand if Suicune has no Energy cards attached.)

attacks.name: Hypno Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, this attack does 30 damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Synchronized Lift
abilities.effect: As long as you have Articuno ex and Zapdos ex in play, the Retreat Cost for Moltres ex is 0.

attacks.name: Flame Gift
attacks.effect: You may move a Fire Energy card attached to Moltres ex to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scorching Wing
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Moltres ex.

abilities.name: Synchronized Lift
abilities.effect: As long as you have Zapdos ex and Moltres ex in play, the Retreat Cost for Articuno ex is 0.

attacks.name: Ice Gift
attacks.effect: You may move a Water Energy card attached to Articuno ex to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Freezing Wing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Synchronized Lift
abilities.effect: As long as you have Articuno ex and Moltres ex in play, the Retreat Cost for Zapdos ex is 0.

attacks.name: Thunder Gift
attacks.effect: You may move a Lightning Energy card attached to Zapdos ex to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lightning Wing
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Burning Aura
abilities.effect: As long as Typhlosion is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.

attacks.name: Flickering Flames
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Typhlosion.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Iron Tail
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.effect: As long as your opponent has Groudon, Groudon ex, Rayquaza, or Rayquaza ex in play, Kyogre ex's attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Aqua Supply
attacks.effect: You may attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.effect: As long as your opponent has Kyogre, Kyogre ex, Rayquaza, or Rayquaza ex in play, Groudon ex's attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Mix-Up
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent discards the top card from his or her deck.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Frenzy
abilities.effect: As long as your opponent has Kyogre, Kyogre ex, Groudon, or Groudon ex in play, Rayquaza ex's attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dragon Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Twister
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psywave
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Devolution Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of either player's Evolved Pokémon, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from that Pokémon, and put it into that player's hand.
